p: Demographic information is shown in Table 2. There were 712 (58.4%) males and 508 (41.6%) females, with a gender ratio of 1.4:1. The majority of patients were under 5 years of age ( n = 1152, 94.4%). The age range from 1 to 3 years was predominant among the patients, followed by 3–5 years and < 1 year, accounting for 53.8, 27.2, and 13.4% patients, respectively. Notably, 1–3-year-old children were more susceptible to EV, and there was no statistically significant difference between age distribution in different groups.
